list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the way in which something, especially an organization or equipment, is organized, planned, or arranged.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: would you feel comfortable in a team-teaching setup?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn sẽ cảm thấy thoải mái trong một thiết lập giảng dạy đội?

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a scheme or trick intended to incriminate or deceive someone.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: “Listen. He didn't die. It was a setup.”
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: "Nghe. Anh không chết. Đó là một thiết lập. "

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in a ball game) a pass or play intended to provide an opportunity for another player to score.
